Tut2_Des1.En: 1. Click the Lantern to enter the capture mode. In the capture mode, click the left mouse button at the corresponding position to perform healing, charge Skill Stones, or weaken the enemy's Shadow Value.
Tut2_Des1.Ch: 1. 点击提灯，进入抓取状态。抓取状态下，在对应位置点击鼠标左键，可以进行治疗、技能石充能或削弱敌人的暗影值。

Tut2_Des2.En: 2. The BUFFs, DEBUFFs, and status of both sides will be displayed here. Hover the pointer over them to view corresponding descriptions.
Tut2_Des2.Ch: 2. 此处将显示双方的增益、减益与状态。鼠标悬浮可查看对应描述。

Tut2_Des3.En: 3. Access more detailed in-game information through these buttons, including detailed attributes, battle configurations, monster skills, and Light Graces, etc.
Tut2_Des3.Ch: 3. 通过这些按钮，可以获取更详细的局内信息（详细属性、战斗配置、怪物技能、微光祝福等）。

PDetail_PBSTitle.En: Player Basic Stats{0}Excluding BUFF, DEBUFF and Light Grace
PDetail_PBSTitle.Ch: 角色基础数据{0}不计增益、减益与微光祝福效果

PDetail_PBSText.En: Player Level{0}Attack{1}Max HP{2}Physical DEF{3}Magical DEF{4}Critical Rate{5}Critical DMG
PDetail_PBSText.Ch: 角色等级{0}攻击力{1}最大生命值{2}物理防御{3}魔法防御{4}暴击率{5}暴击伤害

PDetail_CCText.En: Light Level Requirements{0}Current Light Level{1}Max Light Value{2}Light Value Restore{3}Current Heal Coe{4}Current Shadow Value Reduce Coe{5}Current Skill Stone Charge Coe
PDetail_CCText.Ch: 光照等级要求{0}当前光照等级{1}最大光照值{2}光照值回复量{3}当前治疗系数{4}当前暗影值削减系数{5}当前技能石充能系数

PInfoPanel_Left.En: Attack{0}Max HP{1}Physical DEF{2}Magical DEF{3}Critical Rate{4}Critical DMG
PInfoPanel_Left.Ch: 攻击力{0}最大生命值{1}物理防御{2}魔法防御{3}暴击率{4}暴击伤害

MInfoPanel_MSLeft.Ch: 攻击力{0}最大生命值{1}物理防御{2}魔法防御

Spe_MiniSpring1.En: Restore 5% of Max HP, and gain 10 EXP
Spe_MiniSpring1.Ch: 回复5%最大生命值，并获得10经验值

Spe_MiniSpring2.En: Cost 43 Light Fragment, restore 10% of Max HP, and gain 20 EXP
Spe_MiniSpring2.Ch: 消耗43微光残片，回复10%最大生命值，并获得20经验值

Spr_O1M1.En: Cost 75 Light Fragment, restore 30% of Max HP
Spr_O1M1.Ch: 消耗75微光碎片，回复30%最大生命值

Spr_O2M1.En: Cost 75 Light Fragment, choose 1 Light Grace form 5 random Lv. 1 Light Grace
Spr_O2M1.Ch: 消耗100微光残片，从5个随机1级微光祝福中选择一个

Spr_O3M1_1.En: Cost 30 Light Fragment, get 10 EXP and unlock the next option
Spr_O3M1_1.Ch: 消耗30微光残片，获得10经验值，并解锁下一个选项

Spr_O3M1_2.En: Cost 60 Light Fragment, get 20 EXP and unlock the next option
Spr_O3M1_2.Ch: 消耗60微光残片，获得20经验值，并解锁下一个选项

Spr_O3M1_3.Ch: 消耗90微光残片，获得30经验值
